mapper.select: select ru.id as id, ru.account as account, ru.password as password, ru.name as name, ru.sex as sex, ru.birthday as birthday, ru.phone as phone, rr.name as roleName, rd.name as deptName, ru.status as status, ru.create_time as createTime, ru2.name as createUserName FROM rms_user ru LEFT JOIN rms_role rr ON ru.role_id = rr.id LEFT JOIN rms_dept rd ON ru.dept_id = rd.id LEFT JOIN rms_user ru2 ON ru.create_user_id = ru2.id
